languages.text: Дверь заварена, но я готов вас вывести тайными тропами.

traits.locale_text: Дверь заварена, но я готов вас вывести тайными тропами.

languages.text: {n}Ткач с исчерченным кровоточащими письменами лицом делает почтительный приглашающий жест.{/n} "Я отведу, Домин".
{n}A spinner, his face covered in carved, bleeding glyphs, makes a respectful gesture of invitation.{/n} "Let me show you the way, Domin."
languages.original_text: {n}Ткач с исчерченным кровоточащими письменами лицом делает почтительный приглашающий жест.{/n} "Я отведу, Домин".

traits.locale_text: {n}A weaver, his face covered in bleeding carved glyphs, makes a respectful gesture of invitation.{/n} "Let me show you the way, Enim."
{n}A weaver, his face covered in bleeding carved glyphs, makes a respectful gesture of invitation.{/n} "Let me show you the way, Enim."
{n}A spinner, his face covered in carved, bleeding glyphs, makes a respectful gesture of invitation.{/n} "Let me show you the way, Domin."

{n}A spinner, his face covered in carved, bleeding glyphs, makes a respectful gesture of invitation.{/n} "Let me show you the way, Domin."
{n}A spinner, his face covered in carved, bleeding glyphs, makes a respectful gesture of invitation.{/n} "Let me show you the way, Domin."

languages.text: {n}Un tisseur au visage couvert de glyphes sanglants vous invite d'un geste respectueux.{/n} « Laissez-moi vous montrer la voie, Domin. »
languages.original_text: {n}A spinner, his face covered in carved, bleeding glyphs, makes a respectful gesture of invitation.{/n} "Let me show you the way, Domin."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un tisseur au visage couvert de glyphes sanglants vous invite d'un geste respectueux.{/n} « Laissez-moi vous montrer la voie, Domin. »

languages.text: {n}Un tejedor con la cara cubierta de glifos tallados y ensangrentados hace un gesto respetuoso, una invitación.{/n} «Permita que le muestre el camino, Domin».
languages.original_text: {n}A spinner, his face covered in carved, bleeding glyphs, makes a respectful gesture of invitation.{/n} "Let me show you the way, Domin."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un tejedor con la cara cubierta de glifos tallados y ensangrentados hace un gesto respetuoso, una invitación.{/n} «Permita que le muestre el camino, Domin».

languages.text: {n}顔中に血文字を彫っている織り手は、敬意を込めて招きの仕草をする。{/n}「ご案内しましょう、ドミン」
languages.original_text: {n}A spinner, his face covered in carved, bleeding glyphs, makes a respectful gesture of invitation.{/n} "Let me show you the way, Domin."

traits.locale_text: {n}顔中に血文字を彫っている織り手は、敬意を込めて招きの仕草をする。{/n}「ご案内しましょう、ドミン」

languages.text: {n}一位织网者站在你面前，血迹斑斑的脸上刻满了密文。他向你做了个恭敬的邀请手势。{/n}“请让我为您带路吧，秘者。”
languages.original_text: {n}A spinner, his face covered in carved, bleeding glyphs, makes a respectful gesture of invitation.{/n} "Let me show you the way, Domin."

traits.locale_text: {n}一位织网者站在你面前，血迹斑斑的脸上刻满了密文。他向你做了个恭敬的邀请手势。{/n}“请让我为您带路吧，秘者。”

languages.text: {n}Ein Weber, dessen Gesicht mit eingeritzten, blutigen Glyphen überzogen ist, bedeutet dir respektvoll, ihm zu folgen.{/n} "Ich zeige Euch den Weg, Domin."
languages.original_text: {n}A spinner, his face covered in carved, bleeding glyphs, makes a respectful gesture of invitation.{/n} "Let me show you the way, Domin."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Weber, dessen Gesicht mit eingeritzten, blutigen Glyphen überzogen ist, bedeutet dir respektvoll, ihm zu folgen.{/n} "Ich zeige Euch den Weg, Domin."

languages.text: {n}Yüzü oyularak kan içinde kalmış gliflerle kaplı bir dokur, eliyle hürmetkâr bir işaret yaparak seni davet ediyor.{/n} "Müsaadenizle size yolu göstereyim Domin."
languages.original_text: {n}A spinner, his face covered in carved, bleeding glyphs, makes a respectful gesture of invitation.{/n} "Let me show you the way, Domin."
